page.title: 05Low Farm, Sharlston
page.content: Our farm has 150 acres. Our farmhouse is 412 years old. The actual farm was built in the reign of Elizabeth 1. On our farm we have 2 cottages and 1 bungalow. We grow potatoes, turnips, mangels, wheat and barley. We have a paddock which we use for making hay and we have a clover field. We also keep bullocks, a horse and three dogs. We have 3 tractors, 3 combines and 4 trailers. Our farm is not the same as any of the farms around us. We have a top shed, potato store, bottom yard, calves shed. We also use machinery such as a baler and spinner, tractors and trailers.
